name: Shikigami: The Paper Spirits
description:
Shikigami: The Paper Spirits is a 3D platformer in the style of classic games like Banjo Kazooie and Super Mario 64. In this game, you play Kami, a spirit which posses a children's storybook. Throughout the game you take the form of a variety of origami creatures with differing abilities, which you use to collect pieces of a spellbook to stop the evil spirit, Kuma.

This was developed by me (CJ Legato), Claire Thomas, Axel Stewart, and Kalvin Janik. 

https://shikigamigame.weebly.com/ <-- Webpage with contacts for everyone who worked on this!
